# Auto-generated by tools/generate_building_hooks.py
# Initialization effects for game start
# Uses hardcoded goods names to avoid $PARAM$ issues with variable_map()
# Init effect for royal_court_maintenance

epbm_init_royal_court_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.15 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

epbm_init_house_of_parliament_requirements = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}

		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp

		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}

		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp

		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint

epbm_init_admiralty_requirements = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}

		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth

	}

		name = epbm_temp

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}

		key = goods:books

epbm_init_war_college_requirements = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp

		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }

			has_variable_map = epbm_maint

		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cannons)"
		}

		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cannons

epbm_init_tax_assessor_requirements = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for supreme_court_requirements

epbm_init_supreme_court_requirements = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}

		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold

# Init effect for chancery_maintenance

epbm_init_chancery_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for republican_assembly_maintenance

epbm_init_republican_assembly_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for royal_garden_maintenance

epbm_init_royal_garden_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for local_governor_maintenance

epbm_init_local_governor_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 3.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for naval_governor_maintenance

epbm_init_naval_governor_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 3.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for coastal_fort_maintenance

epbm_init_coastal_fort_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cannons }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cannons)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cannons
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for naval_battery_maintenance

epbm_init_naval_battery_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cannons }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cannons)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cannons
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for bridge_maintenance

epbm_init_bridge_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint

		}

		name = epbm_maint

		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}

		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}

		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp

# Init effect for university_maintenance

epbm_init_university_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for confucian_academy_maintenance

epbm_init_confucian_academy_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.3 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for opera_house_maintenance

epbm_init_opera_house_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.6 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.6 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:wine }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:wine)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:wine
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.6 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lacquerware }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lacquerware)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lacquerware
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

epbm_init_theater_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint

		}

	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint

		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}

	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint

		value = local_var:epbm_temp

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp

	}

			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

epbm_init_jesuit_college_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for art_school_maintenance

epbm_init_art_school_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.3 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:dyes }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:dyes)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:dyes
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for arts_academy_maintenance

epbm_init_arts_academy_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.6 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:dyes }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:dyes)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:dyes
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for soldier_building_maintenance

epbm_init_soldier_building_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for early_capital_building_maintenance

epbm_init_early_capital_building_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for great_madrasa_maintenance

epbm_init_great_madrasa_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for temple_maintenance

epbm_init_temple_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:copper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:copper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:copper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for basic_castle_maintenance

epbm_init_basic_castle_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for grand_apartment_maintenance

epbm_init_grand_apartment_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for capital_building_maintenance

epbm_init_capital_building_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:porcelain }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:porcelain)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:porcelain
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:ivory }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:ivory)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:ivory
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for endrun_academy_maintenance

epbm_init_endrun_academy_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for imperial_halic_shipyards_maintenance

epbm_init_imperial_halic_shipyards_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.24 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for capital_administration_maintenance

epbm_init_capital_administration_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for globe_theater_maintenance

epbm_init_globe_theater_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.3 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:wine }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:wine)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:wine
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for ribeira_das_naus_maintenance

epbm_init_ribeira_das_naus_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.8 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.15 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}
