epbm_init_wissel_bank_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:silver }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:silver)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:silver
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for bolshoi_theater_maintenance

epbm_init_bolshoi_theater_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:liquor }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:liquor)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:liquor
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fur }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fur)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fur
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

		value = local_var:epbm_temp

		name = epbm_temp

# Init effect for college_of_poets_maintenance

epbm_init_college_of_poets_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for bibliotheca_corviniana_maintenance

epbm_init_bibliotheca_corviniana_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for port_building_maintenance

epbm_init_port_building_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for hospital_maintenance

epbm_init_hospital_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fiber_crops }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fiber_crops)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fiber_crops
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:medicaments }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:medicaments)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:medicaments
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:mercury }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:mercury)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:mercury
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for monastery_maintenance

epbm_init_monastery_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.025 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.025 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.025 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beer }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beer)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beer
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for lighthouse_of_alexandria_maintenance

epbm_init_lighthouse_of_alexandria_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

		}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }

		}

		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for guich_garrison_maintenance

epbm_init_guich_garrison_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for herrenchiemsee_abbey_maintenance

epbm_init_herrenchiemsee_abbey_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beer }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beer)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beer
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for usa_academy_of_arts_and_sciences_maintenance

epbm_init_usa_academy_of_arts_and_sciences_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for usa_philosophical_society_maintenance

epbm_init_usa_philosophical_society_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint

		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for phanariot_district_maintenance

epbm_init_phanariot_district_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:sand }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:sand)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:sand
		value = local_var:epbm_temp

# Init effect for jewish_district_maintenance

epbm_init_jewish_district_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

epbm_init_stockade_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for castle_maintenance

epbm_init_castle_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.025 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for bastion_maintenance

epbm_init_bastion_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cannons }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cannons)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cannons
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for star_fort_maintenance

epbm_init_star_fort_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cannons }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cannons)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cannons
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for fortress_maintenance

epbm_init_fortress_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 4.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 4.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cannons }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cannons)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cannons
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for early_soldier_building_maintenance

epbm_init_early_soldier_building_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

epbm_init_nahuatl_warrior_building_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for armory_maintenance

epbm_init_armory_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for training_fields_maintenance

epbm_init_training_fields_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for barracks_maintenance

epbm_init_barracks_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for regimental_camp_maintenance

epbm_init_regimental_camp_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for conscription_center_maintenance

epbm_init_conscription_center_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for market_center_building_maintenance

epbm_init_market_center_building_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:salt }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:salt)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:salt
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:pottery }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:pottery)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:pottery
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for warehouse_maintenance

epbm_init_warehouse_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:salt }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:salt)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:salt
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for funduq_maintenance

epbm_init_funduq_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:jewelry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:jewelry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:jewelry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for smuggler_cove_maintenance

epbm_init_smuggler_cove_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:liquor }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:liquor)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:liquor
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for brothel_maintenance

epbm_init_brothel_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:medicaments }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:medicaments)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:medicaments
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:liquor }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:liquor)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:liquor
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for dock_maintenance

epbm_init_dock_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for dry_dock_maintenance

epbm_init_dry_dock_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for shipyard_maintenance

epbm_init_shipyard_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.8 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.8 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.8 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for grand_shipyard_maintenance

epbm_init_grand_shipyard_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.6 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.8 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.6 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.6 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for naval_base_maintenance

epbm_init_naval_base_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 3.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 3.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 3.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for protected_harbor_maintenance

epbm_init_protected_harbor_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for fortress_church_maintenance

epbm_init_fortress_church_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.025 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:copper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:copper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:copper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tin }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tin)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tin
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

		}

epbm_init_sufi_lodge_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.15 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:incense }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:incense)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:incense
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for bailiff_input

epbm_init_bailiff_input = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.15 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.025 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

		}
	}

		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:coal }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:coal)"
		}
	}
