		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:coal
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for sawmill_maintenance

epbm_init_sawmill_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for colony_maintenance

epbm_init_colony_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:wild_game }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:wild_game)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:wild_game
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:wool }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:wool)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:wool
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for cathedral_maintenance

epbm_init_cathedral_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.025 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:copper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:copper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:copper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for construction_center_maintenance

epbm_init_construction_center_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for counting_house_maintenance

epbm_init_counting_house_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for mint_maintenance

epbm_init_mint_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:silver }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:silver)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:silver
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:copper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:copper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:copper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tin }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tin)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tin
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for fortress_granary_maintenance

epbm_init_fortress_granary_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:wheat }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:wheat)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:wheat
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.025 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:copper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:copper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:copper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tin }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tin)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tin
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for wharf_maintenance

epbm_init_wharf_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for lazaretto_maintenance

epbm_init_lazaretto_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.15 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fiber_crops }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fiber_crops)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fiber_crops
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.03 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:medicaments }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:medicaments)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:medicaments
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for marketplace_maintenance

epbm_init_marketplace_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:jewelry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:jewelry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:jewelry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:salt }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:salt)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:salt
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for merchants_quarters_maintenance

epbm_init_merchants_quarters_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.075 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.075 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:jewelry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:jewelry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:jewelry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.075 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.075 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:salt }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:salt)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:salt
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.03 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for grand_marketplace_maintenance

epbm_init_grand_marketplace_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:jewelry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:jewelry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:jewelry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:salt }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:salt)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:salt
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.04 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for commerce_center_maintenance

epbm_init_commerce_center_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:jewelry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:jewelry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:jewelry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:salt }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:salt)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:salt
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:beeswax }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:beeswax)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:beeswax
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for venetian_arsenal_maintenance

epbm_init_venetian_arsenal_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for kurultai_maintenance

epbm_init_kurultai_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:horses }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:horses)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:horses
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for order_commandery_maintenance

epbm_init_order_commandery_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for copenhagen_dockyard_maintenance

epbm_init_copenhagen_dockyard_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.8 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for caravan_stop_maintenance

epbm_init_caravan_stop_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:salt }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:salt)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:salt
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for north_sea_shipyards_maintenance

epbm_init_north_sea_shipyards_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.8 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for galley_barracks_maintenance

epbm_init_galley_barracks_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }

		}

		name = epbm_maint

		value = local_var:epbm_temp

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}

		}

		}
	}

		name = epbm_maint

		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for janissary_barracks_maintenance

epbm_init_janissary_barracks_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:slaves_goods }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:slaves_goods)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:slaves_goods
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for safaviyya_order_hall_maintenance

epbm_init_safaviyya_order_hall_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:glass }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:glass)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:glass
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for ghilman_barracks_maintenance

epbm_init_ghilman_barracks_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:slaves_goods }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:slaves_goods)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:slaves_goods
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for expensive_capital_administration_maintenance

epbm_init_expensive_capital_administration_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for barcelona_royal_shipyard

epbm_init_barcelona_royal_shipyard = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for ostrog_maintenance

epbm_init_ostrog_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for pomor_outpost_maintenance

epbm_init_pomor_outpost_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.025 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for brethren_marsh_maintenance

epbm_init_brethren_marsh_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for cawa_barracks_maintenance

epbm_init_cawa_barracks_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for kings_manor_maintenance

epbm_init_kings_manor_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for royal_society_maintenance

epbm_init_royal_society_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint

		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }

		}

		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp

	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}

	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp

# Init effect for korean_gunnery_maintenance

epbm_init_korean_gunnery_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:firearms }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:firearms)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:firearms
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cannons }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cannons)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cannons
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for venetian_palaces_maintenance

epbm_init_venetian_palaces_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:jewelry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:jewelry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:jewelry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:marble }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:marble)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:marble
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for moscow_artillery_yard_maintenance

epbm_init_moscow_artillery_yard_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 2.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cannons }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cannons)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cannons
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:horses }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:horses)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:horses
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}

		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint

		}

			name = epbm_temp

		}
	}

		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

# Init effect for ibadat_khana_maintenance

epbm_init_ibadat_khana_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:furniture }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:furniture)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:furniture
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for ruined_great_wall_of_china_maintenance

epbm_init_ruined_great_wall_of_china_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:clay }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:clay)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:clay
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for repaired_great_wall_of_china_maintenance

epbm_init_repaired_great_wall_of_china_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.01 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for royal_atarazanas_seville_maintenance

epbm_init_royal_atarazanas_seville_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:naval_supplies }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:naval_supplies)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:naval_supplies
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.4 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.24 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for bey_fortress_maintenance

epbm_init_bey_fortress_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

epbm_init_mamluk_barracks_maintenance = {

		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:leather }
		}

			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:leather)"
		}
	}

		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:leather
		value = local_var:epbm_temp

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}

		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }

		}

		value = local_var:epbm_temp

		name = epbm_temp

		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
