		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:slaves_goods }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:slaves_goods)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:slaves_goods
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for great_zimbabwe_maintenance

epbm_init_great_zimbabwe_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:ivory }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:ivory)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:ivory
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for khmer_baray_maintenance

epbm_init_khmer_baray_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:clay }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:clay)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:clay
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for bajang_ratu_maintenance

epbm_init_bajang_ratu_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:stone }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:stone)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:stone
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:goods_gold }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:goods_gold)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:goods_gold
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:gems }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:gems)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:gems
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for eghabho_nore_mansion_maintenance

epbm_init_eghabho_nore_mansion_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:lumber }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:lumber)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:lumber
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.5 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for ribat_maintenance

epbm_init_ribat_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.02 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tar }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tar)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tar
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for zhixian_maintenance

epbm_init_zhixian_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:weaponry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:tools }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:tools)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:tools
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for seljuk_mint_maintenance

epbm_init_seljuk_mint_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.25 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:books }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:books)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:books
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:silver }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:silver)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:silver
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:copper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:copper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:copper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for tur_kodjabashi_office_maintenance

epbm_init_tur_kodjabashi_office_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.2 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:weaponry }
		}

			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:weaponry)"
		}
	}

	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:masonry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:masonry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:masonry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Init effect for qalat_al_mashwar_maintenance

epbm_init_qalat_al_mashwar_maintenance = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.05 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:jewelry }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:jewelry)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:jewelry
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 1.0 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:paper }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:paper)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:paper
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}

	set_local_variable = {
		name = epbm_temp
		value = { value = 0.1 multiply = prev.building_level }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_variable_map = epbm_maint
			is_key_in_variable_map = { name = epbm_maint target = goods:fine_cloth }
		}
		change_local_variable = {
			name = epbm_temp
			add = "variable_map(epbm_maint|goods:fine_cloth)"
		}
	}
	add_to_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_maint
		key = goods:fine_cloth
		value = local_var:epbm_temp
	}
}

# Dispatch effect: called per building during init scan
# Scope: building, location accessible via 'location'

epbm_init_building_maintenance = {
	if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:adm_vatican_library }
		location = { epbm_init_library_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:admiralty }
		location = { epbm_init_admiralty_requirements = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:al_azhar_madrasa }
		location = { epbm_init_library_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:alhambra }
		location = { epbm_init_early_capital_building_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:ambras_castle }
		location = { epbm_init_capital_building_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:amsterdam_admiralty }
		location = { epbm_init_port_building_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:archive_of_the_indies }
		location = { epbm_init_port_authority_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:armory }
		location = { epbm_init_armory_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:art_school }
		location = { epbm_init_art_school_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:arts_academy }
		location = { epbm_init_arts_academy_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bailiff }
		location = { epbm_init_bailiff_input = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bajang_ratu }
		location = { epbm_init_bajang_ratu_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:barcelona_royal_shipyard }
		location = { epbm_init_barcelona_royal_shipyard = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bardic_school }
		location = { epbm_init_library_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:barracks }
		location = { epbm_init_barracks_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bastion }
		location = { epbm_init_bastion_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bavarian_academy_of_sciences }
		location = { epbm_init_library_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:belvedere_palace }
		location = { epbm_init_capital_building_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:berlin_palace }
		location = { epbm_init_early_capital_building_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bey_fortress }
		location = { epbm_init_bey_fortress_maintenance = yes }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bibliotheca_corviniana }
